contest-event.event-date: Oct. 26, 1957 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Variations for Brass Band [Vaughan Williams] Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas May 18, 2010, 1:43 p.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 3:02 p.m. 1 The GUS Band Stanley Boddington 2 City of Manchester Alex Mortimer 3 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Jack Atherton 4 Fodens Band Rex Mortimer 5 Ransome Band Eric Ball 6 Morris Motors Band Stanley Boddington 13 Hanwell Band Alfred Jarvis Unknown Result City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Thomas James Powell Unknown Result Fairey Band Eric Ball Unknown Result Creswell Colliery Band George Willcocks Unknown Result Hammonds Saltaire Gershom Collison Unknown Result Wallsend Shipyard George Lee Unknown Result Lewis Merthyr Band Oliver Jones Unknown Result Camborne Town Band Fred Roberts Unknown Result Westoe Band John Harrison Unknown Result Clydebank Burgh Band William Scholes Unknown Result Crookhall Colliery Rex Mortimer Unknown Result St. Dennis Band George Thompson Unknown Result Cooperation Band Elgar Clayton Unknown Result Brighouse and Rastrick Band Eric Ball Unknown Result Luton Band Albert Coupe
